title: How do we change, edit or remove the "activate live" form?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I need to change some of the information on my Unity Multiplayer live request.

sections.title: Cause
content: You have submitted your "activate live" form and now wish to change, edit or cancel it.

sections.title: Resolution
content: The live request needs to be cancelled manually by our team.
Email multiplayer@unity3d.com with your developer ID and request, or alternatively use the template below.
I would like to cancel my Multiplayer live request.
